comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Louisa Lee Schuyler (1837-1926); her wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Louisa_Lee_Schuyler This is apparently a photograph from Columbia University's commencement in 1915; Schuyler received an honorary LL.D. that day, the first woman so honored at Columbia. Virginia C. Gildersleeve (1877-1965); her wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Virginia_Gildersleeve Gildersleeve was the Dean of Barnard College.
